element.title: Inklusion
element.description: ORIGENES: Este proyecto nace el 5 de enero 2018 de la unión de varios equipos de kodi (Adrianlist, Festa, Kodispain,Tvchopo) De esa unión nació el addon más especial de kodi, SIN BARRERAS. Un addon dedicado a personas con algún tipo de discapacidad, visual, auditiva, motora, ... Un proyecto hecho con mucha ilusión, cariño y respeto por parte de los creadores. Como en la vida misma, los amigos se enfandan, otros toman otro rumbo y los caminos se separan, pero el proyecto continúa por parte de algunos miembros. 2 años y medio después nos arrebatan: el grupo, el nombre, pero jamas las RAICES. No pasa nada, quien no ha cambiado alguna vez de domicilio o se ha hecho un cambio de look? Pues bien, aqui surge INKLUSION, nueva casa, nuevo look, mismo mantenimiento que el último año y medio.LAS RAICES NO SE PUEDEN BORRAR CON UN DEDO. Gracias a los que alguna vez formasteis parte de esto. Continuan con el mantenimiento: Grupo @addonfestaycristal Creadores Sin Barreras: Adrián Hdz, Delhia, Er Migué, Iker, Jorge H, La mala de la novela, LouFesta, Luisma, Pepe, Picapau, Supertopo, Torete. Colaboradores Sin Barreras: Jesus, Lis, JuanS, El rincon de lolo, ToniClasico, AnaM, Natalia, Dani, MikelVito, ElecdekaurUguay

element.title: Script Module LiveStreamer
element.description: Livestreamer is a command-line utility that pipes video streams from various services into a video player, such as VLC. The main purpose of Livestreamer is to allow the user to avoid buggy and CPU heavy flash plugins but still be able to enjoy various streamed content. There is also an API available for developers who want access to the video stream data.
element.summary: Livestreamer extracts streams from various services

element.title: Script Module PyAMF
element.description: The Adobe Integrated Runtime and Adobe Flash Player use AMF to communicate between an application and a remote server. AMF encodes remote procedure calls (RPC) into a compact binary representation that can be transferred over HTTP/HTTPS or the RTMP/RTMPS protocol. Objects and data values are serialized into this binary format, which increases performance, allowing applications to load data up to 10 times faster than with text-based formats such as XML or SOAP.AMF3, the default serialization for ActionScript 3.0, provides various advantages over AMF0, which is used for ActionScript 1.0 and 2.0. AMF3 sends data over the network more efficiently than AMF0. AMF3 supports sending int and uint objects as integers and supports data types that are available only in ActionScript 3.0, such as ByteArray, ArrayCollection, ObjectProxy and IExternalizable.
element.summary: PyAMF provides Action Message Format (AMF) support for Python that is compatible with the Adobe Flash Player.

element.title: Elementum Android 32
element.description: Elementum is a torrent finding and streaming engine. It doesn't go on torrent websites for legal reasons. However, it calls specially crafted add-ons (called providers) that are installed separately.[CR]This project is a fork of the well known, but no longer maintained Pulsar/Quasar projects from steeve and scakemyer.

element.title: CCloudTV
element.description: cCloud is an open source cloud based social IPTV service. It is built by the community for the community, where streaming is just a click away. Just click, play and stream. Yes, it's that simple. Just go to [COLOR blue]http://ccloudtv.org[/COLOR] and enjoy:) Please report any channels that are down here [COLOR blue]http://www.tiny.cc/reportchs[/COLOR] Users can now check servers status which can be found at [COLOR blue]http://ccloudtv.org/status[/COLOR]
element.summary: All the best from cCloud TV

element.title: Upnext
element.description:
Provides a netflix style pop up notification for watching the next episode with
fancy/simple modes. A prompt to check if your still watching also occurs after a few automatically watched
shows in a row.

element.title: Extended Info
element.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions.

element.title: Cherrypy
element.description: CherryPy is a pythonic, object-oriented web frameworkCherryPy allows developers to build web applications in much the same way they would build any other object-oriented Python program. This results in smaller source code developed in less time.CherryPy is now more than ten years old and it is has proven to be very fast and stable. It is being used in production by many sites, from the simplest to the most demanding.
element.summary: CherryPy webserver packaged as Kodi module

element.title: Six
element.description: Six is a Python 2 and 3 compatibility library. It provides utility functions for smoothing over the differences between the Python versions with the goal of writing Python code that is compatible on both Python versions. See the documentation for more information on what is provided.

element.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.

element.title: Youtubedll
element.description: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction for hundreds of sites. Version is based on youtube-dl date version: YY.MDD.V where V is the addon specific sub-version. Also provides downloading with the option for background downloading with a queue and queue manager.
element.summary: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction

element.title: Videodevil
element.description: This addon plays videos from YouPorn, Tube8, Boysfood, MoviesAnd, PornoTube, xHamster, KeezMovies and some other adult streaming sites. It contains explicit adult material. You may only view this addon if you are at least 18 years of age, or at least the age of majority in the jurisdiction where you reside or from which you access this content. If you do not meet these requirements, then you do not have permission to use this addon.
element.summary: Play videos from different adult streaming sites

element.title: GayMods
element.description: Home of plugin.video.hubGAY a porn addon focused on the Hub Traffic sites but with additional sites being added such as Motherless, Porkytube, and Tumblr. Also there is a STRAIGHT settings so it can be gay or straight, kinda bi I guess! ;) The rest are mainly gay oriented addons for XBMC/Kodi or other gay relatred content such as movie scrapers. WORK IN PROGRESS i never intended this to be used by many people it was all jut to make my personal quest for porn easier. Addons by antigenx, xbmcadult, and others with gaymods by moedje. Many of these are works in progress, or have only minor changes to them to help filter out straight porn or display gay porn categories. They include many various sources and AGX repo was first that I saw with some exclusive gay addons which I added into this repo and modified a bit. There is also a random TV plugin called WSOnline which is for the website Watchseries-Online and it scrapes the latest 250 shows and sources for a show and has searching. It was really just a personal thing but others may find it useful. The main plugins that are the most solid in this repo is the plugin.video.hubGAY and the non gay porn related plugin.video.wsonline for Watchseries-Online website.
element.summary: Gay oriented addon's for Kodi/XBMC. Plugin.Video.hubGAY addon for gay and straight porn from HUB Traffic and more. Plugin.Video.WSonline a Watchseries-Online TV Addon.

element.description: Browse collections (user designed categories) as well as the most popular videos today/week/month as decided by the users of the site
element.summary: Fantasti.cc - Browse videos from a site that aggregates the best porn videos online using the votes of users as the deciding factor

element.title: Searching
element.url: Después de que la hija de 16 años de David Kim desaparece, se abre una investigación policial. Pero 37 horas más tarde y sin una sola pista, David decide buscar en el único lugar donde nadie ha buscado todavía y donde se guardan todos los secretos hoy en día: el ordenador portátil de su hija. David debe rastrear las huellas digitales de su hija antes de que desaparezca para siempre. Un thriller que se desarrolla en la pantalla del ordenador.

element.title: Kodi se cierra al reproducir contenido
Kodi closes when it plays some content
O Kodi fecha quando reproduz algum conteúdo
Kodi péchase cando reproduce algún contido
Kodi es tanca quan reprodueix contingut
element.url: Si Kodi se cierra de repente a la hora de reproducir contenido, simplemente debes desactivar aceleracion.
If Kodi suddenly closes when playing content, you should simply deactivate acceleration.
Se o Kodi fechar repentinamente ao reproduzir o conteúdo, você deve simplesmente desativar a aceleração.
Se Kodi se pecha de súpeto ao reproducir contido, debes desactivar a aceleración.
Si Kodi es tanca de cop i volta a l'hora de reproduir contingut, simplement has de desactivar acceleració.

Settings, Interface, Skin and select the one you prefer, but be careful, since there are some skins that are only for touch devices
Configurações, Interface, Skin e selecione o que preferir, mas tenha cuidado, pois existem alguns skins que são apenas para dispositivos touch.
Configuración, interface, skin e seleccione a que prefira, pero coidado, xa que hai algunhos skins só para dispositivos táctiles.
Ajustos, interfície, Skin i selecciona el que vulguis, però vés amb compte, ja que hi ha alguns skins que només són per a dispositius tàctils

element.title: Configurar ResolveUrl
Set up ResolveUrl
Configurar ResolveUrl
Configurar ResolveUrl
Configura ResolveUrl
element.url:
Ajustes, Sistema, Addons, Gestionar Dependencias. Asegúrate de estar en modo experto.
Con esta configuración vas a poder elegir diferente calidad en addons

Settings, System, Addons, Manage Dependencies. Make sure you are in expert mode.
With this configuration you will be able to choose different quality in addons like Palantir

Configurações, Sistema, Complementos, Gerenciar dependências. Verifique se você está no modo especialista.
Com esta configuração, você poderá escolher diferentes qualidades em complementos como o Palantir

Configuración, sistema, complementos, xestionar dependencias. Asegúrese de estar no modo experto.
Con esta configuración, poderás escoller diferentes calidade en complementos como Palantir

Ajustos, Sistema, Addons, Gestionar Dependències. Assegura't d'estar en mode expert.
Amb aquesta configuració podràs triar diferent qualitat en addons com Palantir

element.title: Reset Addon
element.url: Muchos addons, para que funcionen, hay que ir a sus ajustes, pulsar en donde dice Por Defecto y luego en Ok
Many addons, to make them work, you have to go to your settings, click on where it says Default and then on Ok
Muitos addons, para fazê-los funcionar, você precisa acessar suas configurações, clicar no local onde está Default e depois em Ok.
Moitos complementos, para facelos funcionar, tes que ir á túa configuración, facer clic en onde di Por defecto e logo en Aceptar.
Molts addons, perquè funcionin, cal anar als seus ajustos, prémer en on diu Per Defecte i després a Ok
